title: Cake Mania All 3 Games plus Patch PC
description:
Cake Mania 1,2+3

Cake Mania

Description

Help a young baker show big bad business who&#039;s boss in this fast-paced treat! When the retail behemoth "Mega-Mart" moves in, Jill&#039;s beloved family bakery is forced to close. But she&#039;s determined to get the business back on its feet with delicious sweets. Help Jill open her own bakery, bring in customers, and earn enough money to re-open her grandparents&#039; bakery! With 48 levels and four different bakeries, Cake Mania is full of mouth-watering fun. Let&#039;s get cookin&#039;!

System Requirements

OS: Windows 98, Windows 2000, Windows XP, Windows Me Memory: 128 MB
DirectX: 7.0
CPU: P400

Cake Mania 2

Description

Jill is back in an all-new, out-of-this-world adventure! Explore six far-flung bakery locations, serving up deliciously original creations! What awaits Jill? Fame? Fortune? Love? In Cake Mania 2, you choose which path Jill pursues, with each decision leading to new baking challenges and dilemmas. With 204 levels of baking and frosting madness, 6 different possible endings and a branching, non-linear storyline, it&#039;s your decision to make in Cake Mania 2!

System Requirements

OS: Windows 98, Windows 2000, Windows XP, Windows Me, Windows 98SE
Memory: 512 MB
DirectX: 9.0 or later
CPU: P800
Video: 3D Video Card with 16MB Video RAM

Cake Mania 3

Description

As Jill prepares for her long anticipated wedding day, disaster strikes when a mysterious time bender crashes to the ground and shatters into pieces. As Jill&#039;s family and friends rush to pick up the scattered shards, they are suddenly sent hurtling through time! Now, to ensure her wedding goes off without a hitch, Jill herself must travel to remote periods in time and work her cake-making magic on a wide variety of locals in order to get herself and her guests back before the ceremony begins!

System Requirements

OS: Windows XP
Memory: 512 MB
DirectX: 10.0 or later
CPU: P 1.0GHz
Internet: Active Internet Connection

IMPORTANT!!! READ THESE INSTRUCTIONS
Patch Included   

01. Double click on the setup and run the installer.
02. Double click on the patch.
03. Single Click Patch (message will read Cannot find the file. Search the file?) Click yes.
04. Locate the game files (usually in Program Files)
05. Double click the folder (You will then see all game files)
06. Double click the .exe file.
07. Game is patched. Now click exit.
08. Enjoy your full game!
